Certainly! Here are the PDDL actions for the task "Grow Fairy Moss Indoors":

### PDDL Actions

#### Action: ask_for_moss
```pddl
(:action ask_for_moss
    :parameters (?p - player ?loc - location ?moss - fairy_moss)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (nursery ?loc) (not (inventory ?p ?moss)))
    :effect (and (inventory ?p ?moss))
)
```

#### Action: find_container
```pddl
(:action find_container
    :parameters (?p - player ?container - container)
    :precondition (and (not (inventory ?p ?container)))
    :effect (and (inventory ?p ?container))
)
```

#### Action: fill_bowl
```pddl
(:action fill_bowl
    :parameters (?p - player ?bowl - container ?water - water)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?bowl) (not (filled ?bowl)))
    :effect (and (filled ?bowl))
)
```

#### Action: add_fairy_moss
```pddl
(:action add_fairy_moss
    :parameters (?p - player ?moss - fairy_moss ?bowl - container)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?moss) (inventory ?p ?bowl) (filled ?bowl) (not (contains ?bowl ?moss)))
    :effect (and (contains ?bowl ?moss))
)
```

#### Action: place_suitable_position
```pddl
(:action place_suitable_position
    :parameters (?p - player ?bowl - container ?loc - location)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?bowl) (suitable_position ?loc))
    :effect (and (placed ?bowl ?loc) (not (inventory ?p ?bowl)))
)
```

#### Action: prune_fairy_moss
```pddl
(:action prune_fairy_moss
    :parameters (?p - player ?moss - fairy_moss ?bowl - container)
    :precondition (and (contains ?bowl ?moss) (grown ?moss))
    :effect (and (pruned ?moss))
)
```
